trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Definerer størrelse-relaterte attributter i punktgrafikk bufret.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: Punktgrafikk skaleres basert på verdier som er definert av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> med tom skalering egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>får den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>satt til `true`, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>satt til null, og den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>satt til null.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: Når sendt til en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, inndataene er lik utdataene.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> som beholder størrelsesforholdet for bitkartet for kilden og angir en opprinnelig <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>får den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>satt til `true`, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>satt til verdien for `pixelHeight`, og den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>satt til null.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på resulterende punktgrafikken i piksler.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når pixelHeight er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> som beholder størrelsesforholdet for bitkartet for kilden og angir en opprinnelig <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"> </xref> skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende punktgrafikken opprettholder det opprinnelige størrelsesforholdet og størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>får den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `rotation`, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>satt til `true`, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>satt til 0, og den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>satt til 0.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: Første rotasjon-verdi som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes bare 90 grader om gangen.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> som beholder størrelsesforholdet for bitkartet for kilden og angir en opprinnelig <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>får den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>satt til `true`, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>satt til null, og den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>satt til verdien for `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på resulterende punktgrafikken i piksler.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelWidth is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når pixelWidth er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> som ikke beholde det opprinnelige størrelsesforholdet punktgrafikk.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende punktgrafikken har en gyldig størrelse `pixelHeight` x `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>får den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>satt til `false`, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>satt til verdien for `pixelHeight`, og den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>satt til verdien for `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på resulterende punktgrafikken i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på resulterende punktgrafikken i piksler.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når pixelHeight er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på punktgrafikkbildet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: PixelHeight must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelHeight må være større enn null skal være gyldig.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på bildet.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på punktgrafikkbildet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: PixelWidth must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelWidth må være større enn null skal være gyldig.

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på bildet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som bestemmer om størrelsesforholdet bildets opprinnelige punktgrafikk beholdes.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det opprinnelige størrelsesforholdet beholdes, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>representerer maksimumsstørrelsen verdiene for punktgrafikken.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende punktgrafikken garanteres bare har bredden eller høyden samsvarer med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis størrelsesforholdet ikke beholdes den angitte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>begge brukes, og punktgrafikken strekkes for å bruke disse verdiene.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det opprinnelige størrelsesforholdet beholdes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som representerer rotasjonsvinkelen som brukes på punktgrafikk.

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes bare intervaller på 90 grader.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: Rotasjonsvinkelen som brukes på bildet.
